Sentencas: As the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system work environment is a high-temperature environment for a long time, it is difficult to obtain the SOFC stack internal state change directly.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: When the fault occurs, it is difficult to determine where the fault occurs.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: Moreover, the existing literature ignores the impact of faults, which creates many problems for SOFC system control.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: Therefore, a state observer-based fault detection method, which is used to detect the input flow sensor fault and the fuel input fault, is proposed.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: Their advantage is that they do not need data processing.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: To realize the fault detection, the observer is used to track the changes of SOFC stack chamber temperature.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: To obtain the observer estimation parameter, an approach from the actual stack structure parameters is employed to approximate the observer parameters.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: The results show the proposed fault detect method can judge fuel input fault type quickly and shield the disturbances signals from the sensor effectively.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply

Sentencas: The proposed method also can be used to other operating points or air input fault.
Titulo: Control-oriented fault detection of solid oxide fuel cell system unknown input on fuel supply
